Reviews.Title: be aware!
Reviews.Author: T. J. Michaud "racyg"
Reviews.Content: this looks like a wonderful well made cord but I haven't been able to use it yet because the yellow video cable is two male ends. Only the power/ red cable is male to female. Yes that is in the description. but when ordering a extension cable you would think that it would extend your cable without needing another connecter. I have now ordered my connecters and once I have them I will update this review. Just be aware you will need a BNC Female to Female Connector Adapter to use this cable.
